page.title: 08Transport through Lydlinch
page.content: For people without a car there is not much opportunity to leave the village.Only one of the local bus companies serves the community, {Mr R.J.Cuff}of Piddlehinton. On Mondays the service runs between Sturminster Newton and Templecombe.If you want to go to Sturminster market the bus picks up at the "Three Boars"at 10.22 and arrives in Sturminster Car Park at 10.32.The return bus leaves at 12.30 arriving at Lydlinch at 12.40.There is also a bus into Sturminster at 13.29 but no corresponding return trip. On Wednesdays in term-time he runs a bus to Gillingham leaving the "Three Boars" at 09.23 and returning at 12.25 to arrive at 13.29. There is also a National Bus Company stop for longer journeys but these have to be booked in advance.
